The amount of negativity, the depth of grudge in their minds are just immense (in some extent this statement is true for myself as well). When I was only into the bands like maiden or priest, I honestly felt very positive inside my mind with their music. But from when I started to listening to black metal I could clearly feel that a hidden demon was just silently growing up inside my mind by the span of time, I started to think only about the negative and darkest possible sides of every aspects of human life. Most of the true black metal musicians and fans are complete failures at their lives. Yes, black metal impacts your career and social interactions in every possible way, as long as your mind day by day turns into a sanctuary of darkness and hate. And my addiction to black metal is kind of responsible for such demise of my career at this point. If you’re a practicing christian and listening to black metal at the same time then I can clearly say that you’re doing just wrong thing regarding to your belief. Thus black metal creates some sort of loopholes in your astral body and these loopholes then work as the gateways of satan to devour your body and the soul. If you’re spiritual (no matter what religion you do follow) just give up listening to black metal. I didn’t yet gave up listening to black metal but I can clearly feel that I should give up immediately at this point of my life.
